description:
What is the power of passive income?

Think of this course as Passive Income - 101

It's a primer on what passive income is, the benefits of passive income, the five best ways to create it, and what passive income is not.

This is not a program for getting rich quick.

Although it will introduce you to five of the best ways to create passive income, this course is more about why creating passive income is so important, how to position yourself to attract it and how to use it to enhance your life.

Having money is great, but how you design your lifestyle to attract and use that money is even more important. That's what this course is about.

It includes:

  • 3 success strategies for creating passive income
  • 3 critical mindsets for attracting passive income
  • 2 dangerous pitfalls on the road to creating passive income
  • 5 top ways to create passive income

It also includes a bonus section with tips on handling success once you achieve it and coupons with huge discounts off of my Kindle Publishing course.

I have been studying and experimenting with strategies for creating passive income for over 10 years. In that time I have not only learned about how to actually create passive income. I have also learned how to evaluate the quality of that income.

I have learned that the value that I give back in exchange for that income and the quality of life that income creates for me are as important, if not more important than the income itself.

Whether you are new to the idea of passive income or have been chasing it for years like I did, this course will guide you to a better understanding of how to attract it and how to use it to enhance the quality of your life.

This course is being offered FREE for a limited time.

Click on the Take This Class button at the top of this page and start your journey today.
title: 5 Powerful Passive Business Ideas to Work from Home in 2016
